events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago, but it still hasn't been delivered and the tracking number shows no updates.
Categorised the issue as Delivery Delay based on keywords related to late shipping and tracking problems.
Assigned to the logistics support team for investigating the delayed shipment and possible shipment issues.
Hello, thank you for reaching out. I understand your order hasn't arrived yet, and I'm here to help resolve this.
Could you please provide your order number and the tracking ID so I can look into the shipping status for you?
Sure, the order number is 987654321 and the tracking ID is TRK123456789. I haven't received any status updates for these.
We've contacted the courier, and they confirmed a delay due to unforeseen logistics issues. Estimated delivery is now within 3 days.
Thanks for the update. I appreciate the explanation. I'll wait for the next few days and hope it arrives soon.
Your order was successfully delivered today according to delivery records. Please let us know if everything is in order.
Just checking in to ensure your order arrived as expected and you are satisfied with the delivery experience.
Since we have not received any further concerns, we are closing this case. Thank you for your patience.
